sense.name: brood, dwell on
sense.commentary: Is: DWELL ON Syntax Is: NP1 DWELL ON NP2
sense.examples: He never dwelled on himself and his many aches and pains. He dwelled on the situation in his country. She dwelled on the grades and the comments and the looks and the future.

sense.name: inhabit, consist
sense.examples: Strange thoughts dwelled in her mind. This fish dwells at the bottom of the ocean. The people dwelled in woods and lived by agriculture. The problems dwell in the social injustices in this country.
